description: This file implements the advanced interface functions of the Bwsp Site Creator Object, specifically the function BwspScoCspConfigProperty which configures object properties within the broader Broadway Web Service Plane Implementation (BWSP). It includes license headers, module description, and a function that sets object properties.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspScoCspConfigProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hProperty)
methods.description: Configures the property of the Bwsp Site Creator Object by invoking its SetProperty method with provided property data.
